name: Groceri Emoji
description: Groceri Emoji is an application to simplify online grocery shopping with the click of an emoji.

name: Eat Da Burger!
description: Eat Da Burger! is an application that lets users input the names of burgers they'd like to eat/have already eaten.

name: Budget Tracker
description: An application that allows the user to keep track of there their budget whether they're online or offline.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: An application using Open Weather API, allowing users to search city's current weather information and forecasts for the next 5 days.

name: Job Search
description: An application to search for jobs by location, using both Muse and GitHub Jobs APIs.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: An application to be able to view, create, and track daily workouts. Users are also able to track the name, type, weight, sets, reps, and duration of the exercise.
